summary: Empire Builder train board games brought to the digital world. Starting with Empire Builder - Europe as the base game, we will release each of the games in this series for all to enjoy.

name: Emperium
summary: An epic adventure filled with loot, and monsters. Enter the world of Emperium!

name: Emergency 4
summary: Coordinate firefighters, police, medical personnel and specialists in the classic EMERGENCY 4 Deluxe! Now with the previously untranslated bonus missions in English.

name: Em.Path
summary: Immersive witch and camping simulator set in a surreal world glitched beyond salvation. Travel and maintain your RV, pickup strange hitchhikers, study the occult and rewrite the laws of nature

name: Emma Adventure
summary: An adventure begins because of a young girl's hunger. Her name is Emma. The conclusion of how the adventure ends is up to you. Let's have an adventure

name: Emerald Mine II
summary:
Emerald Mine II is an Boulder Dash variant and features no gameplay changes in comparison to its predecessor besides the new level editor. The player's goal is to collect diamonds which are surrounded by dirt. When walking over an dirt spot, it is cleared and an stone above it will fall down - with unhealthy results if the player or a monster is hit by it. Other items are dynamite to clear out boulders and keys for certain doors. 
 
The need to plan ahead and find out the required steps to reach the diamonds give the game a puzzle-solving character. Besides the about hundred levels in single-player, there are additional levels for two players.

name: EmagineWorld
summary: In this game, you can freely switch the size of the voxel, and the player's perspective can also be converted synchronously. Pyramid voxels allow you to build buildings with angled angles. By slicing voxels into smaller sized voxels, you can create rich details for buildings.

name: EmyLiveShow: S&M Story - Safe Edition

name: Empire of Sin: Make It Count
summary: Make It Count is the first major expansion for Empire of Sin, adding a new playable boss: Maxim Zelnick, the “Mob’s Fixer.” Zelnick brings a string of ways to expand your empire, including the Fixer gangster profession, Loan Shark racket, additional missions, weapons, events, and much more.

name: Emergency Christmas
summary: Santa got dead and you have to infiltrate the illuminati before they make evil santas something something save christmas and shoot stuff you know how it goes figure it out.

name: Emi: Christmas Special
summary: Emi and our Protagonist find themselves on the naughty list this year! Follow their holiday escapades as they earn their way back into Santa's good graces.

name: Empire of Empires
summary: Have you ever thought about what it's like to defend your territories from enemies?

name: Embodiment
summary: In this 2D puzzle platformer, take control of a blob with the ability to take control and embody skeletons. Use their abilities to swim, climb, and fly through the facility.

name: Ember the Werefox
summary: Resourceful by day, fierce by night; young Ember must survive and redeem the nightmare forest.

name: Empire Deluxe
summary: Empire Deluxe is a strategy game where players control cities to build units and conquer the map.

name: Empress of the Deep 3: Legacy of the Phoenix
Ember Crusade IV
summary: Ember Crusade IV is a twin stick looter shooter roguelike where you embark on a blazing crusade to save the solar system from a demonic invasion.

name: Empire of Sin: Day One Edition
Empire: Total War - Special Forces Units & Bonus Content
summary:
In a time when a soldier's life could be given easily and quickly, it took extreme courage and determination for a true hero to forge a reputation for themselves. Whether through harsh and highly disciplined training, generations of successful military tradition or world-leading technology, the Empire: Total War Elite Units are among the very best of the best.

The Special Forces Units introduces six of the most influential military forces of the 18th Century. True to the period, these exclusive elite units become available on the campaign map via a certain faction or once a specific geographical region is under control. This pack also includes three more exclusive Elite Units, previously unavailable for sale.

Each elite unit brings with it the potential to open up dramatic new strategies and turn the tide of your campaign. A cornerstone of your Empire's land or naval forces, each has the potential to be used to decisive and devastating effect.
Empire: Total War Special Forces Units & Bonus Content consists of the following premium content for aficionados of the Total War series. This content is for use with Empire: Total War. Once Empire: Total War is installed the elite units will become available in the single player game under the conditions stated below.

name: Emilio Sanchez Vicario Grand Slam
summary: In this tennis simulation, the player is Spanish tennis hero Emilio Sanchez Vicario. The player can play tennis against the computer or against a friend in two player mode.

name: Emeraldium
summary: From beautiful beaches to dangerous caves, this is the enchanting place also known as... Emeraldium! Claim the island full of emeralds in this match-3 adventure.

name: Emergency: Fighters for Life
summary: The player receives a series of missions that he must complete involving the rescue of injured and endangered civilians, extinguishing fires, and arresting any violators of the law, some scenarios would be like: an accident at a race track, a plane crash, a flood, a traffic accident and a bomb threat, as well as scenarios based on true events such as Ramstein airshow disaster.

name: Emberfall
summary:
Emberfall is the first roguevania-survivor: a roguelite, metroidvania, and survivor-inspired action-platformer.
You must extract from the deadly catacombs of the fallen citadel "Lemia" in less than 10 minutes.
Emberfall puts you in control of Kali, who defeated the God of Greed and the Goddess of Light. Now, the gods have failed, and the citadel will collapse.
Tough and fast, with snappy controls and endless challenges.
Enjoy an idling-combat system and focus on finding your way out while dodging enemies.
The game offers a simple but enjoyable roguelite system.
Purchase upgrades across your runs to become more powerful from the start.

name: Emergent Magic
summary: Dash between your foes an unleash spells of your own creation. Build your own magic peice by peice, gather the elements and mark them with runes to do your will. Your weapons are creativity and intellect in this first-personn spell-slinger where YOU are the spell designer.

name: Empty Town
summary: 3D VR Horror Shooting Game with the classic laser gun play style, immerse in this high quality fiction world.

name: Empty
summary: Empty is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Suo Xiangzi (锁箱子). Suo Xiangzi starts in her room, not able or unwilling to leave. Instead she can flick the light switch beside her bed to dream or access her computer to view wallpapers.

name: Emoji Sport
summary: The soybean man sports meet has started, and you can manipulate your soybean man to compete and use different techniques to achieve different best results in the competition.

name: Empire I: World Builders
summary: First entry in a three-part-series about colonizing space. In the first game you prepare to find a suitable new world in the vastness of space.

name: Empyre: Earls of the Deep Earth
summary: It's the time before the Flood. The world is a strange place. Especially for you. How do you solve the mystery of your missing memory? Are you trapped? Can you leave? Ever? Enjoy a Neo-Victorian version of the Orient! Embark on a journey to explore a wondrous land filled with mystery and intrigue!

name: Emplacement
summary: Emplacement is a turn-based strategy game. Build up a floating metropolis while destroying your enemies. Place your tiles across the map while strategically building up your army & economy. Come up with strategies similar to chess to become the best!

name: Emberwake
summary: A dark fantasy survival strategy game where you manage villagers, gather resources, and defend a burning campfire against waves of undead in a relentless battle for survival.

name: Empires Apart: French Civilization
summary: The French Knights charge into battle! Play as the proud French – a Defensive civilization that focuses on formidable cavalry, great economy, technology and siege weapons.

name: Embers
summary: Take a breath. Feel the warmth as you sip your favorite tea. Are you ready? Now, step away from the bustle of your daily life and into the shadows of the deepest forest. Write, reflect, and stare into the embers.

name: Empire of Disorder
summary: An episode of 9 small maps with various classic themes (base, medieval, wizard, runic, brick, etc.) for vanilla Quake, but also works well in Copper / with co-op support.

name: Emerald Shores
summary: Emerald Shores is a challenging SNES-inspired platformer with a bunch of twists. Level up, take on rewarding sidequests, play a variety of minigames, unlock secret levels, raise a pet monster, and more! Can you liberate the floating island world of Emerald Shores from its captors?

name: Emerald City
summary: Emerald City is a 15 map episode for Doom II designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. These maps illustrate the decay of a metropolis conquested by the plant and animal kingdoms after the fall of Man...

name: Employee of the Month
summary: An atmospheric retro inspired survival horror game. Enjoy the late shift at 'The Month' in an abstract and unsettling night of terror, spooks and convenience.

name: Ember Lord
summary: "Ember Lord" is an exciting isometric 3D survival game

name: Ember: Reignition
summary: Ember: ReIgnition is a local multiplayer competitive fighting game in which you and your friends play as a lost knight and his spectral adversary, engaging in combat to determine the final survivor.

name: Empty Soul: S&S Edition
summary: EMPTY SOUL takes you into the story of Solan Walls, a young scientist girl who suffered a terrible accident. Now she must escape from horrible nightmares. Face the fear in this horror indie game!

name: Emergency Ambulance Simulator
summary: Emergency! Help people! With an ambulance! But not really because it's a simulation.

name: Emerging Tactical
summary: Take your hero on a quest to become a tactical medic!

summary: EM: Shader Attack is a hardcore arkanoid with colorful effects and unusual game elements. In this game you will play again and again!

summary: EmbodyMe

Empire Warriors TD
summary:
From Google Play: I know you’re smart: Fight powerful enemies with your wise strategies! Lead your mighty heroes and protect your kingdom frontier from the darkness with our Tower Defense Offline Fight Game.

A large community: Join millions of players around the world in an endless war to gain triumph and glory. If you are a true fan of the Fantasy Tower Defense td offline Fight game, you can't miss this td Fight game! The wonderful graphics and impressive gameplay will surprise you.

name: E-Motion
summary: A puzzle game for early computer platforms and later ported to the Game Boy.

name: Emergency Call 112: The Fire Fighting Simulation 2 - Volunteer Firefighters
summary:
In the DLC you have the possibility to customize the appearance of your character. For the first time, female firefighters also join the volunteer fire department. If you are not alerted to a mission or invited to a training course, you can spend the time in your player apartment or in the freely explorable world.

With your own car, you can always get to the fire station quickly from anywhere. There you can meet your comrades for courses or missions.
Go through courses from squad leader 1 to group leader and go on missions according to your qualification. In addition to a theoretical part, the courses always include many practical exercises. In this way, you can gradually expand your knowledge and apply it directly in practice.

name: Emperial Knights
summary: You incarnate as a powerful knight to help the Emperials to defeat the darkness in the Tower of Infinite game mode. You will vanquish waves of monsters to reach the bosses and claim your loot with your friends or alone.

name: Emergency HD
summary: Command fire brigades, rescue services and police forces in a rescue strategy game with realistic graphics! Fight against fires, save lives and eliminate terrorists - in 14 elaborate missions!

name: Empire Patron
summary: Empire Patron is a medieval fantasy world of collectible card game with role-playing game elements and an epic story. You will have the option to control one of the five great armies in five unique card arenas and battle role-playing arenas.

name: Emerald Rush
summary: Guide our hero through the gauntlet of abandoned mine levels, collecting emeralds, diamonds and other valuables. The local township speaks (behind closed doors) of bug and alien infestations. Such rumors don't concern you, right? Surely aliens wouldn't come all the way to Earth just to hide underground? Of course not.

summary: Solve 30 medical cases with mini games.

summary: Empire is a turn based strategy game where the player founds cities and build armies in order to achieve world domination.

name: Empty Handed
summary: 2d point-and-click 3rd person indie horror game where you collect items and clues and solve puzzles to uncover a mystery while evading the frequent pursuit of an unstoppable killer.

name: Empty Bottle
summary: EmptyBottle is a fresh styled, thought-provoking narrative adventure game. Players will embark on an adventure in a world that full of cups, bottles and jars.

name: Emoji Face Jump!
summary: Jump action game. Emoji wanders in a broken world. Guided by a mysterious voice that tells them to aim for outer space to escape from here, they aim for the sky only by jumping. The mysterious voice curses you every time you fail. Will you be able to reach the universe while enduring the abuse?

name: Embers of War
summary: Embers of War is a fusion of role-playing, real-time strategy, visceral action, strategic tower defense, and addictive hero management set in an original science fiction universe and packed with all of your favorite flavors including charismatic heroes, ruthless betrayal, and an ancient malevolent evil. The game is designed for both keyboard with mouse and controller configurations.

name: Emerita
summary: A puzzle game about digging carefully through falling sand. Made for for LD29

name: Emergency 2

name: Emergency Driver Simulator

Show everyone you're the top driver, able to complete each job without fault, quickly climb the ranks and become the City Hero you were always meant to be! Emergency Driver Simulator is a unique driving game that allows you to take up multiple careers and show your skills in every one of them. Your work will be done in the early morning hours, when most of the people people are sound asleep. Their safety though will be in your hands! Enter the road and engage in a variety of jobs and trials. From simple, everyday tasks to real emergencies, it will be up to you to keep the city functioning!

name: Empire of the Wicked
summary: A magical challenging indie top-down RPG where you have to dismantle the Empire of the Wicked by leveling up, completing quests, training skills, slaying bosses and collecting items/equipment. Compete online with other players in the gladiator arena to claim exclusive rewards!

name: Empis
summary: Empis is a turn-based strategy game that focuses on short and sweet multiplayer matches. Choose from individual factions each with their own unique units and upgrades, unlock technology, and build sprawling cities with buildings and fortifications.

name: Emergency: Road Services Simulator
summary: Take a part in car repair missions on the roads. Grow your small business into the best roadside assistance in the town. Help customers in need and save their cars from breaking down. Emergency Road Services Simulator will teach you how to deal with minor and major car breakdowns.

name: Emergency Monster Team
summary: Nadel is a Berserker Paramedic who is headed back to work after the events of the "Pipe Man" took place in the monster city of Dendsville. The city is on high alert, so the hospital director has asked her to work inside for the evening. She’s tasked with helping the staff and patients.

name: Empire of the Dead Souls
summary: Empire of the Dead Souls - it's tower defence with elements of clicker, in which you need to defend your shrine from various dead souls, that are more than 1000 years old. Don't let monsters to destroy your shrine by killing them. With each level of the soul begin to move faster, also each new level you will meet new souls and at the last level you need to beat the boss.

name: Emi-chan no Moero Yakyuuken
summary: Moero Yakyuuken is basically strip rock paper scissors, there's not much more to the game except that Emi puts clothes back on when both of you choose the same option.

name: Embrace of Ocean: Story of Hope
summary: Help a young girl find her father and discover the secrets behind his scientific activities. Only you are able to investigate the disappearance of the brilliant scientist.

name: Emergency Room
summary: The first game in the Emergency Room series of doctor simulation games.

name: Empire of Sin: Hunt For Aurora
summary: The second expansion for Empire of Sin includes new game mechanics, missions, and powerful characters that come to visit Chicago. The question is, will you let them stay?

name: Empyrean Frontier
summary: Empyrean Frontier is a Real Time Strategy game about an epic interstellar conflict, featuring massive space fleets, base building, and resource collection. Conquer the galaxy in a procedurally generated campaign or match wits against the cunning AI in a variety of skirmish game modes.

name: Ember Knights: Wrath of the Architect
summary: The Wrath of the Architect DLC opens a portal to a new dimension! It is your mission to battle through four altered worlds filled with deadly new monsters and bosses… with the fate of reality itself at stake!

name: Embershade
summary: A psychedelic roguelike where you sell pieces of your soul to gain power against surreal, impressionistic monsters.

name: Emi: New Beginning
summary: A short adult visual novel about Emi, a beautiful young woman who is back from college to stay with you while she figures out her next move in life. The game features 260+ 4K pre-rendered stills and 10+ 4K animated scenes, which vary depending on your choices.

name: Emerald Bathhouse
summary: A Small-Medium sized level for vanilla Heretic that replaces E3M1.

name: Emote Search
summary:
Emote Search is the version for streamers inspired by the popular "word search" games, made to enjoy with your audience. All you need is the chat to send the answers.

Engage with your viewers and play cooperatively to beat levels. It's easy to set up, and you pay nothing for it - the best option to add more fun and engagement to your live streams.

name: Emerald Eyes
summary: "It all startet with a dream. I saw myself - standing in front of a swimming bath. I felt strange. I felt strong. I felt the desire to kill. I knew my victim. She was in there. She had to die, she had to drown. Water was the first element. I couldn't stop myself. I had to kill..."

name: Emoyan no 10-bai Pro Yakyuu
summary: Emoyan no 10-bai Pro Yakyuu is a Sports game, published by Hect, which was released in Japan in 1989.

name: Empire Deluxe: Combined Edition
summary:
Empire Deluxe: Combined Edition is the latest in the classic Empire Series of games, which has spanned almost five decades.

Empire Deluxe is a game about taking cities. Starting with just one, the city enables a commander to produce units. These units in turn can directly attack or support the attack of more cities. Your imperialistic desires are not satisfied until you have taken every city on the map.

name: Embrace the Fear
summary:
"Embrace The Fear" is a first-person perspective of the chamber to escape the game.
Players in an abandoned house, cold floors, old furniture, swaying lights,
in this environment players need to collect in each room to decrypt the clues,
crack the puzzle can open a Road room door, the final escape from the house.

name: Empty Sharp
summary: Play the part of Rosalie, a wicked girl forced to take a long journey due to an unexpected tragedy. Leave Lanya capital and go searching yourself; ask mysterious entities, dark creatures and mere humans to find a way to heal.

name: Empire
summary: Empire is the name of a computer game written for the PLATO system in 1973. It's significant for being quite probably the first networked multiplayer arena shooter-style game. It may also be the first networked multiplayer action game (although Maze War is another possibility for this distinction).

name: Empower
summary: Enter a physics based PC VR multiplayer Sci Fi arena sandbox that supports ranged and close combat. Switch dynamically between PC and VR mode and compete against other players and complex AI with fully physics-based weapons in a partially Zero G arena with different modes.

name: Empire Run
summary: Run through centuries of history in this fast paced, side-scrolling adventure! Collect coins and facts, avoid artifacts, defeat enemies, and race your way through five great world empires: Ancient Egypt, Ancient Rome, The Maya Civilization, The Ming Dynasty and The Mughal Empire.

name: Emergency 3
summary:
Their lives are in your hands - can you take the pressure?
In this re-release of the classic EMERGENCY 3 it's your job to save lifes! Command many different first responder units in an exciting mix of simulation and real-time strategy.

name: Emergency Room Simulator
summary: In "Emergency Room Simulator" you become a dedicated doctor in the emergency room, responsible for diagnosing, treating, and saving lives. This professional simulation offers an immersive experience of the challenges and rewards of working in a fast-paced medical environment.

name: Empire of Angels III
summary: Sequel of Empire of Angels II with whole new plot.

name: Empire III: Armageddon
summary: The world is in chaos: You have to find the Empress and destroy the Empire.

name: Empolicy
summary: Online strategy in a fantasy world with single-player options. Explore the world, expand the borders of your polis, build settlements and produce goods. Immerse yourself in the role of a powerful tycoon of the city-republic, choose your path - magic, diplomacy, espionage or war.

name: Empire Defenders
summary: Empire Defenders is a real time strategy game with an original visual style. Armies of enemies invade your lands! Take command of large forces, slay your foes and save your realm!

name: Emerge: Cities of the Apocalypse
summary: Part turn-based resource management, part real-time defense shooter, Emerge places you into a futuristic world, ravaged by a zombie Apocalypse.

name: Empire Deluxe: Mobile Edition
summary:
Empire Deluxe Mobile Edition is a game for the mobile generation. In this turn based strategy game, explore a randomly generated world, expand to capture and exploit cities, encounter enemy units and exterminate them.

Three styles of play, basic, standard an advanced with units ranging from armies and armor, to transports and battle ships, to fighter and bomber aircraft.
Solitaire play with up to five computer opponents on randomly generated maps.

name: Emojikara: A Clever Emoji Match Game
summary: Match 3 with emojis!

name: Empires and Tribes
summary: Empires and Tribes is a unique hybrid of a medieval city builder and a role-playing game. You will undertake the duties of a mayor in the 13th century and manage the expansion of your city, ensure the production of resources and raise a powerful army to protect yourself from rival principalities.

name: Emergents Trading Card Game
summary: Emergents: Trading Card Game (also known as Emergents TCG) is an innovative digital trading card game where you own the cards. Capture the magic of the golden era of comics! Build your deck with a team of unique characters, superheroes and villains, across five distinct factions, and get ready to smash your opponents as you battle across the streets of Culverton.

name: Emote Guesser
summary: Emote Guesser is a browser game for twitch users, who are familiar with twitch third party integration tools like bttv and 7tv. You can guess emote names from different channels, with emotes activated. The main goal of the game is to guess the correct names of the emotes in a specific time period. The most challenging part of the game is to guess every emote, with can be 300 emotes for specific channels. Afterwards share your statistics with your friends and see who is the better twitch emote user.

name: EmptyEpsilon
summary:
EmptyEpsilon is a spaceship bridge simulator game. It's fully open source, so it can be modified in any way people wish. 
 
EmptyEpsilon places you in the roles of a spaceship's bridge officers, like those seen in Star Trek. While you can play EmptyEpsilon alone or with friends, the best experience involves 6 players working together on each ship. 
 
Each officer fills a unique role: Captain, Helms, Weapons, Relay, Science, and Engineering. Except for the Captain, each officer operates part of the ship through a specialized screen. The Captain relies on their trusty crew to report information and follow orders.

name: Emblem
summary: Emblem is an RPG starring Gip, a boy who must rescue his kidnapped sister.

name: Emmanuelle
summary: Emmanuelle is an erotic graphical adventure game from Coktel Vision, originally released in 1989 for Amiga, Atari ST, and IBM PC (DOS). The game was developed by Muriel Tramis, who is perhaps better remembered from her games in the Gobliiins series. The game is considered to slightly erotic, but not pornographic

name: Em Busca dos Tesouros
summary: Em Busca dos Tesouros is a platformer developed by then 15-year-old Tadeu Curinga and published by the computer magazine Micro Sistemas.

name: Ember's Verge
summary: Bushcraft and survive on a deserted island where nature is both your greatest ally and fiercest adversary. As the weather turns colder toward winter, preparation becomes key to survival. Build shelters, hunt, fish, farm, and craft items from natural resources—all without any modern tools.

name: Empire FactionWar
summary: Immerse yourself in an epic world where you control a faction and fight for dominance of several cities. Strategy, economic management and military tactics are essential to achieve victory. From growing your cities' economies to upgrading your troops with weapons and equipment.

name: Embers of the Zombie Battlemage: Halloween - Real Werewolves of Massachusetts
summary: Adds a new guest to the base game, as well as new story content for Leo!

name: Emono
summary: You play as Yuri, a 16-year-old teenage girl, living in an industrial city in Japan, 1986. On your way home from school, you go to a store near you to buy groceries for dinner, but you are being followed.

name: Emerland Solitaire: Endless Journey
summary: Welcome to Emerland Solitaire, the land of card magic! An incredible journey awaits you, in a beautiful world filled with dwarfs, elves, mermaids and many other amazing creatures.

name: Emberdrift
summary: A flow platforming rogue-like with extremely fast paced combat and traversal, punctuated by insane movement abilities, epic bosses, and over-the-top upgrades.

name: Emma's World
summary: You’re invited Home with Emma to play with her and all of her family and friends in her gigantic world - Emma’s World, a fun, imaginative Dollhouse game filled with interactive homes, shops, schools, hospitals, and many rooms to explore!

name: Empire of Revenant
summary: An engaging Live2D visual novel with deep plot.

name: Emiko's Pledge
summary: Emiko's Pledge is a 2D Platform Action game based on the story of a Half Demon girl called Emiko, whose mission is to fulfill her dream of becoming the best warrior in the Demon world and also, to protect the Ettaze state from the enemies who infiltrated into the territory.

name: Empires of the Void II
summary: A sci-fi turn-based strategy game. A faithful digital rendition of the beloved board game, Empires of the Void II.

name: Emily: Displaced
summary: A choice-based visual novel about a child affected by war

name: Empires Apart: Mongol Civilization
summary: The Golden Horde rides into battle! Play as the unstoppable Mongols – an aggressive nomadic civilization that focuses solely on cavalry.

name: Empyrean
summary: Overthrow your father's regime with his own secret experimental fighter plane! Dogfight dieselpunk aeros to save your city and the iron jungle beneath it.

name: Empire of Angels IV: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Empire of Angels IV Game (Region Free)
Empire of Angels IV Manual
Empire of Angels IV Collector’s Box
Empire of Angels IV Original Soundtrack
Empire of Angels IV Numbered Certificate

name: Emmy: The Funny Game
summary: Emmy: The Funny Game is an early eroge where the player is challenged to persuade the titular girl strip off her clothes.

name: Emberdoom VR
summary: Fight off the Ember invasion in VR as they arrive in action packed waves while you try to defend your world from impending doom. Now you can battle the Ember in Virtual Reality like never before! Strap on your headset and join the fight.

name: Empires
summary: Empires is a medieval survival game. Gather, craft, survive!

name: Empath
summary: Fight magical adversaries with your bare fists in this fantasy-action VR brawler for Oculus Rift!

name: Emergency 2014
summary: Send your help troops to deal with disastrous situations around the city

name: Emergence
summary: An awe-inspiring open-world VR art experience exploring human behaviour, the individual and the collective. Immerse yourself among thousands of strangers. Watch from above as your movements influence the crowd in changing environments that are both wondrous and intimidating.

name: Embrace
summary: Embrace is a very short experimental game about embracing things that happen in life.

name: Empires Apart: Arab Civilization
summary: The blades of faithful shine on the battlefield! Play as the relentless Arabs - an advanced civilization that focuses on knowledge and conversion.

name: Emotions: A Day In A Life
summary: Pick emotions in conversations to drive the story forwards

name: Emprise
summary: Emprise is an Adventure-RPG that changes everytime you play, based on your decisions

name: Empyrion: Galactic Survival - Dark Faction
summary: Explore a more dangerous galaxy and survive the merciless Dark Faction species and their strange power in the Dark Faction DLC! Master updated melee combat, build with new materials, and uncover deep mysteries in a brand-new scenario.

name: Empire: Four Kingdoms
summary: Make your dream a reality and become a king and castle lord with the Empire: Four Kingdoms app! Produce new resources and build your small castle into a mighty fortress! Recruit a powerful army to conquer more land for your kingdom and defend it against enemy attacks. Form alliances with friends to defeat your enemies or fight epic battles against countless other players. In this mobile app your strategy determines whether you become a legendary king or remain a simple peasant! Of course you can also follow your destiny on a PC – with Goodgame Empire, the browser version of this game.

name: Emergency 2012
summary:
A cold snap in London and Munich, Riots in Paris after a severe storm, blistering heat in Berlin, massive bush fires in Athens: The year is 2012 and the world as we know it seems to have spiraled out of control. As the head of rescue operations it’s your job to ensure the safety of the population. Guide the police forces, fire brigades and specialist rescue crews to save hundreds of lives! 
 
Take on natural disasters, terror attacks and more as you battle to regain order and bring the town back from the brink of destruction. The world is counting on you, can you handle the pressure?

name: Emmy II
summary: The second version of the Emmy eroge series.

name: Empires Through the Aeons
summary: A Massively Multiplayer Grand Strategy game set in medieval Europe. Build up your territories, care for the needs of your Population, forge alliances and lead your house and empire to glory.

name: Employee A
summary: Employee A is a pixel art point-and-click adventure set in the heart of the modern-day high technology industry. Inspired by classic mystery game series like Ace Attorney and Zero Escape, Employee A will test your logic and deduction skills as you investigate the murder mystery that's upturned your life.

name: eMemories
summary: Solve a simple puzzle and open pictures.

name: Empire Chronicles
summary: Turn Based Strategy RPG. With complex skills, sprawling world and detailed storyline.

name: Embers: Return to Dragonland
summary: Save your legacy from the goblins by embodying legendary dragons in this cooperative twin-stick shooter action.

name: Emberzone
summary: Emberzone - is a short, first-person story game. It's a story about loss. You play as a simple girl in whose life happens something horrible.

name: Emily's Flights
summary:
This is a quick service game! It will take you to experience the flight attendant life! Become an airplane flight attendants, in a fast-paced game to take good care of every passenger! Ensure each passenger can enjoy a wonderful sailing!
Be a flight attendant!

name: Ember Knight Solitaire
summary: Your quest is to discover the Ember Knight's treasure. Along the way you will need to show strength and determination as you will meet danger and evil along the way. There will be obstacles to overcome and battles to conquer.

name: Empire: The Deck Building Strategy Game
summary: The barbarous tribes who fought amongst themselves for so many aeons are at last able to come together to found a wondrous civilization. Is yours the first of its kind in this world, or one of many? No man knows, but what all men know is that their Empire must not only survive, but flourish! The world is full of terrible horrors, however, and they will wear away at your Empire from all sides. Natural resources have become more scarce. And perhaps worst of all, your powerful Empire has grown heavy and full of internal strife with its age. How long can you stand the pressures of survival before your Empire finally comes crumbling back down into the desolated earth from which it grew? Empire: The Deck Building Strategy Game introduces the world's first "Deck-Building 4X Strategy Game". Empire is a quick, easy-to-learn yet difficult to master strategy/tactics game.

name: Empire Earth: Gold Edition
summary:
This Gold Edition contains:

- Empire Earth (base game)
- Empire Earth: The Art of Conquest (add-on)
- Official strategy guide

name: Empty Mind: Blank Fate
summary: You're Engel. You wake up in a basement of a house. You don't remember nothing about your life and you don't know why you are there. You need to discover who are you searching information at the house. A religious painting and some other objects could tell you something about your true life. And remember, you're not alone in the house. There're a lot of people interesting in your virtues. Engel is sceptic with the situation. It seems like a kidnapped but there're powerful and superhuman reasons for his confinement.

name: Embers of the Evening
summary: The oil is running out. The expedition is doomed. You will never reach the lighthouse. But something worse than death awaits you if you give up. Operate the engine. Explore the ship. Unveil the truth that lies beyond your reality.

name: Empire of Ember
summary: Empire of Ember is an action RPG and strategy game. You play as a Lightbringer, a young wizard who just inherited rule over a destroyed city. You have to rebuild it to its former glory while you live adventures in first-person, dual-wielding steel and magic, exploring procedurally generated dungeons and leading your troops to clashes of up to 100 units. You can customize your city to its finest details with a 3D city-builder, and then upload it for other players to explore and siege.

name: Emma: In the Library
summary: You find yourself in a rundown public library where you meet an interesting woman with sexual appetites!

name: Emo's Match Maker: The Game of Love
Emily Archer: The Curse of King Tut's Tomb
Emerland Solitaire 2: Collector's Edition
summary: An exciting journey into the world of magical Solitaire awaits! A stunning new game with classic rules. Hundreds of fun levels, dangerous opponents and heroic companions await you in an adventure full of mysteries and secrets!

name: Emmerholt: Prologue
summary: This is the prologue of Emmerholt - an upcoming open world, magic wielding, story driven, adventure game for the HTC Vive, and Oculus Touch. Currently in development by Oneiric Entertainment!

name: Emberance
summary: Step into the shoes of the female protagonist as she learns about her past. Visit her childhood home, uncover the mystery that surrounds that place and maybe she'll even find some sort of closure.

name: Em
summary: EM is a fast-paced, hard hitting 3D fighter featuring Electro-Magnetic combat. To win the war against the machines, you as an elite fighter will go fist to fist on a mission to annihilate them all!

name: Emiko's Pledge 4
summary: Emiko's Pledge 4 is a 2D platform action game based on the story of a half-demon girl called Emiko, who wants to become the best warrior of the Ettaze state and abroad, as well as protect the weak.

name: Empty Head
summary: In the small hamlet of Elkedor lives the Baker family, isolated and almost ''inexistent'' for the townsfolk. Arold, family man and lawyer with no fame, enters in a difficult time of his life between alcoholism and a falling apart marriage. His days began getting filled by drinking more and more, while his wife and their two children, Sarah and Thomas, started to get detached and cold. One night the two went missing. Desperate at the thought of losing them he decided to investigate until, thanks to clues found in the house, succeeds in finding a hidden passage. Lies, compulsions, and hatred are the summary of what underlies in the ambitious Baker family.

name: Empire of Steel and Bone
summary: EoSnB is a resource gathering survival game with plans leading into strategy style game play. There are three primary staged objectives we wish to hit with the game to get it where we wanted it to go and hope you enjoy playing and testing it out as it makes that journey.

name: Empire of Karn
summary: You are thrown in a war between the king of Vorzdeshaa and the Emporer of Karn.

name: Emkayo
summary: Action-packed first-person shooter game designed to enhance your skills and reflexes.

name: Emily the Strange: Skate Strange
summary:
Emily The Strange: Skate Strange is the latest edition to the ever expanding universe of Emily the Strange - dive into the exciting world of skateboarding and explore over 36 levels located in the picturesque cities of Paris, Moscow, London and New York.

Collect a wide variety of super charged power ups to ride in slow motion, skate upside down or even jump through portals that transport you instantly to a totally different location!

Try out some crazy moves on your skateboard: play air guitar, perform a handstand or the famous 'ollie airwalk'!

The extensive level editor brings endless fun: create your own levels and then skate them!

name: Embers of Caerus
summary: Embers of Caerus is an indie first-person MMO depicting an original low-fantasy game world, developed by Forsaken Studios

name: Embark
summary: Embark is a base building game where players have to manage a group of colonists in a fight for survival.

name: Empire of Atlantis
summary: Rodrigo, the fisherman's son one day finds a letter in a bottle on the beach. With some help of his grandfather he understands that it tells him how to find the famous lost city of Atlantis. Now Rodrigo and his grandfather along with their dog Uzo sets out on a journey to find the long lost island.

name: Emergency Crew 3: Perfect Getaway - Collector's Edition
summary: Our heroes are finally taking their well-deserved vacation to a chic tropical paradise! But alas, a major earthquake interrupts their vacation before it even starts and turns a secluded tourism destination into an isolated disaster area.

name: Emurinoo
summary: Control the legs of an Emu (or is it an Ostrich?), traverse across tricky environmental challenges, and most importantly, don't give up!

name: Emery
summary: Emery is a feature rich, fast paced and gameplay focused 2D platformer! Players are able to create their very own Emery class charge bot, and explore mysterious worlds in their search to find and recharge other lost bots!

name: Empire of Angels: Lace Fantasy
summary: Board wargame game released on Android and iOS devices, based on Empire of Angels II.

name: Empires Apart: Aztec Civilization Pack
summary: The warriors of Tenochtitlan rush into battle! Play as the fierce Aztecs – an aggressive civilization that focuses on strong warriors, spies and priests.

name: Empyrean Swarm
summary: Escape the alien threat! Unleash searing lasers, fire precision phasers, and launch sizzling plasma bolts. Blast, spin, and cut your way through hordes to unlock your ship's potential as you unveil hidden horrors. Challenge the world, arcade-style, and ascend as the galaxy's ultimate pilot!

name: Emblem of Gundam
summary: Emblem of Gundam is a strategy game based on Gundam's early Universal Century universe.

name: Emovi
summary: Guess a movie with emoji!

name: Emerald Dragon
summary: Emerald Dragon is a Role-Playing game, developed by Alfa System and published by Media Works, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Emission VR
summary:
Kill as many zombies, go through as many corridors can be possible. 
And all this in virtual reality!

name: Emotion
summary: This is the story of an android that regains the deprived emotions Defeat a large number of enemies and strong enemy bosses and proceed while growing Dark 2D action game

name: Empire Classic
summary: Empire Classic is a 4X wargame developed by Ben Norton in 1984 and basey on Peter Langston's 1971-game Empire. This version of Empire was written in Pascal on an HP3000 and released to the HP3000 Contributed Library.

name: Emotional flow
summary: A precision platformer game where there is no jump button!

name: Emzombed
summary: Emzombed - You must kill all of the Zombies and solve the mystery of the island.

name: Eman Quest
summary: Experience a procedurally-generated mini-RPG with memory-based battle mechanics, in an epic quest to save Aisha's parents from an unknown evil! Our unique memory mechanics challenge to you use not just your wits but your memory to succeed!

name: Empyreal Dawn
summary: Empyreal Dawn is a Gothic Fantasy Adventure where you lead a party named Caeruleum. Together with your Swordsmaiden partner, Alice Starwell, undertake your first steps toward becoming legendary heroes! Featuring professional voice acting, an original soundtrack, and more!

name: Ember's Love
summary: Ember's Love is an RPG adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Emotions
summary: Enter the world of Rika. She sets out to meet UFOs and unrestrained people. Conquer the enigma of a crazy major. Solve the riddle to save the humanity. There should be only one reality. For nowadays and forever. But Rika has tendencies to schizophrenic emotions.

name: Empires Apart: Korean Civilization
summary: The Noblemen of Korea lead the offensive! Play as the magnificent Koreans - an advanced civilization that focuses on gunpowder units and economy management.

name: Empire Earth II: Platinum Edition
summary:
A compilation of the Empire Earth II games. Included in this bundle are:

- Empire Earth II
- Empire Earth II: The Art of Supremacy
- Prima Official Game Guide

name: Empire of Sin: Deluxe Edition
summary: Empire of Sin: Deluxe Edition includes the Mobster Pack, Golden Weapon Set, and the Curb Stomp Execution kill animation.

name: Empire of Sin: Premium Edition
summary: The Premium Edition grants access to all Deluxe Edition content plus two post-launch expansions and the stylish Al Capone’s Fur Coat costume.

name: Empedokles Domain
summary: Medium sized Wizard level.

name: Emerge
summary: The fourth link in the C.H.A.I.N. anthology is a mysterious exploration game. Its case report has a mysterious (now dried) liquid on top of a mostly illegible synopsis.

name: Empire: Galaxy Burning
summary: A shoot-em-up game (loosely) inspired by the likes of Crimson Clover, Mushihimesama and R-Type, battling against an ancient superweapon to save both the galaxy and a close friend!

name: Emerald Caravan
summary: An economy-roguelite game with rpg elements and a rich narrative. Embark on an epic journey through treacherous dungeons and lead your trading caravan to shape your own destiny.

name: Emerald Mine
summary:
A conversion of the classic Boulder Dash game. The player is deep down in a cave and have to collect emeralds and diamonds while evading monsters - and the laws of gravity, which have the annoying habit of squishing him with huge rocks if he happens to stand beneath one as it falls down.

The game also has a two-player mode where two people can rid caves of their valuables at the same time - in addition to the 80 levels, there are 20 exclusive two-player levels.

name: Embedded VR
summary: Shoot first, ask questions later

name: Emoji Clicker
summary: Get ready to dive into the colorful world of emojis like never before! In Emoji Clicker, your mission is simple: collect, upgrade, and dominate with the most diverse and powerful collection of emojis!

name: Emergency Crew 2: Global Warming
summary: Hurricanes are raging in Sunland! Once again, Stephen Shepard leads an Emergency Crew to help people in their hour of need and get to the bottom of what's going on.

name: Emergency Parking Only
summary: A physics-based parking pileup for up to four players. Smash other players' cars out of the way while placing your own cars perfectly - all without any brakes. A delightfully silly party game that'll have you rolling!

name: Emma in the Mountains
summary: It has some minigames and stuff. They probably take place in the mountains.

name: Empire Z
summary: After the zombie apocalypse you must form powerful alliances to protect yourself and restore humanity. Engage in combat with thousands of players online!

name: Empress of Gold
summary: 1336, Feudal Japan. The player takes on the role of a ninja, out for vengeance against a corrupt Nobel. Maybe the Empress of Gold can help restore balance, unless she's already captured.

name: Empress's Choice
summary: Empress's Choice is a fancy dress-up game, simulates ancient noble life in imperial palaces. To rejuvenate your family, you enter the palace harem bravely, from an anonymous maid to the powerful empress. You can decide what happens next, such as acquainting handsome confidants, cultivating children, and getting promoted by palace competing. Experience the glorious ancient palaces.

name: Emerald Isle
summary: Welcome to "Emerald Isle", a pixel art video game inspired by ancient mythological Ireland. Explore lush environments, battle monsters with weapons and magical abilities, and uncover the secrets of the land. Grab your sword, summon your courage, and become a hero of ancient Ireland!

name: Empire Takeover
summary: This is a fun & amazing tower crush game! Crush enemy's towers, take over the empire!

name: Emergency in Space
summary: You are the sole survivor aboard an abandoned space ship, lost in the vastness of space. Silence reigns around you, with the sounds of cosmic waves and the echoes of the ship's systems. Your mission is to survive.

name: Emoceans
summary: you are an emotionally unstable ship.

name: Emin's Journey
summary: Join Emin in a thrilling quest for lost happiness in this captivating pixel art adventure. A 2D platformer by a creative mind, it goes beyond conventions for an intense and memorable journey.

name: Empyrios: Prophecy of Flame
summary: Empyrios is a turn-based strategy RPG that will include two campaigns; one for each of the two factions. The campaigns each show a different side of the same narrative.

name: Emiru Game
summary: The First Rhythm game in where there is now over 30+ buttons pressed for each note on rhythm. Each song will feature songs by Marcus Owen Bell.

name: Empyrean Scout
summary: Maneuver your scout corvette through a wonderous but hostile domain. Abuse its superior agility to grind enemies for gear and XP, empowering you to venture further. Empyrean Scout is a space combat Action-RPG, built from the ground up for VR.

name: Empire
summary: In a traditional fantasy RPG, play as several characters in a time of war as they fight for freedom while a greater darkness grows amidst the chaos.

name: Empires II
summary:
Awaken your instincts and conquer the world! Develop a war strategy, determine a country’s strengths and weaknesses, fortify your lands and dominate!
From the moment you select your country of origin, every decision becomes strategic. How will you spend your budget? How will you secure your borders? Will you defeat the enemy or team up to take over the world? In a game of tactics, play as one of 9 regions and wage war against 165 countries. Venture around the large-scale map, sail across oceans and battle your way through victory and defeat.
“He who knows when he can fight and when he cannot, will be victorious.” - Sun Tzu
The goal is world domination, and the struggle for power has never been more fun.

name: Emerald Wasp
summary:
Operation Rassvet was a model of surprise.

It started as an intelligence operation and ended up becoming one of the most mysterious disappearences to these days. None of the members were found. Forgotten by the world, the last survivor is hiding in the shadows...

name: Embracing Darkness
summary: "Embracing Darkness" is a fan visual novel in which players can enjoy a short encounter with Local Villains Tiefedorf and Shuraomaru.

name: Empires in Arms
summary: He who controls Europe, controls the world… Empires in Arms is the official licensed computer version of Australian Design Group's classic board game. Empires in Arms is a seven player game of grand strategy during the Napoleonic period of 1805-1815. Playable either solitaire against the AI or by e-mail. Corps level with full diplomatic options to allow players complete freedom to fight it out for control of Europe any way they want to.

name: Ember Souls
summary: Ember Souls is a thrilling VR hack-and-slash game blending parkour, climbing and environmental puzzles in a luxurious Persian palace. Harness the power of the Ember Stones to unlock new abilities and use your combat skills and agility to defeat the mysterious Shadow Sultan.

name: Empire of Angels II
summary: Second game of Empire of Angels series, released on MS-DOS.

name: Emo Neccky
summary: Emo Neccky is a short Yume Nikki joke fangame created by an anonymous Uboachan member. It stars Kanashimito.

name: Emma, the Story
summary:
Elliott is paralyzed by doubt. Tomorrow he must go to Emma, far, far away from here.
But on the eve of his departure, a strange meeting will change his future.

name: Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania
summary:
Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania is a new match 3 game with talking cat Emma as the main character, who will guide you through the levels and watch you make progress. If you are a fan of fruit splash games, you will certainly have fun with this one. Download Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania matching game and enjoy this fruit blast adventure!
There hardly is a person who once wasn't addicted to a certain match 3 game.

name: Empire of Angels: Angels' Curse
summary: Remake of Empire of Angels released on feature mobile phone.

name: Empire City Simulator
summary: Become a ruler and build the ancient city of your dreams in Empire City! Unlock new opportunities for your city's prosperity, gain the support of the gods, construct grand buildings, and create unique infrastructure. Transform a small settlement into a magnificent center of civilization!

name: Emre and Jevon's Tale of Knowledge, Emulating a Dream Where You Gain Wisdom and Knowledge and Probably Meet Hermes
summary: This is the game we made for the LSD game jam in two weeks even though we had way more time. Its father is the sun and its mother the moon. And it was borne from the earth where it ascends to the heaven and becomes ruler over that which is above and that which is below.

name: Empire of Angels
summary: First game of Empire of Angels franchise, released on MS-DOS computer. It's one of the first turn-based strategy video game made in Taiwan. The game is in 4-bit color. The game has been remade and released on iOS devices in 2013-04-18.

name: Empire
summary: This turn-based game aims at short sessions and can be played up to 6 players on the same playdate!

name: Emmyrea
summary:
Emmyrea is an Adventure game, developed and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 2001

The gameplay is a first person perspective ADV in which the player will have to take decisions that will leave the story to different places.

name: Empty Horizons
summary: Following the sudden death of her father, Mireille Maiorano is sent to live with her uncle in France. Enter Lyon, a tactless, perverse Frenchman charged with escorting to Mireille to her new home. She hates him passionately, with everything she has... so why does he make her heart flutter?

name: Empty
summary: In the world of "Empty" Earth is flat, and Depart from the very ground. You will be controlling "Master Humpback", Jump through each level and collect "Red Core". While you walk through Each level, you will discover the Story of "Empty".

name: Emiko's Pledge 2
summary: Emiko's Pledge 2 is a 2D Platform Action game based on the story of a Half-Demon girl called Emiko, whose mission is to protect all the residents of the Ettaze state from the enemies who infiltrated into the territory.

name: Embers of the Zombie Battlemage: Halloween
summary: Run a haunted theme park, defend it from a zombie overlord, and don't kill your co-workers in this park management/strategy RPG hybrid!

name: Emoji 2 Words: Guess and Sort
summary: Emoji 2 Words Guess and Sort is a brain challenging puzzle game. Search and find hidden English words by combining two or more emojis .

name: Emergency HQ
summary: Build your own mission base and put together the perfect emergency services team!

name: Empire Heroes: Sudoku Puzzle
summary: A sudoku game from ELIGRAPHICS.

name: Emergency Room: Life or Death
summary: The fourth game in the Emergency Room doctor simulation series.

name: Empathy: Path of Whispers
summary: Empathy: Path of Whispers is an atmospheric and story-driven adventure game where you explore a seemingly abandoned world through the emotions and memories of the people who once inhabited it, trying to restore the world’s lost balance by journeying through its past.

name: Empire of Sports
summary: Empire of Sports allows you to create your own sports hero.

name: Empire II: The Art of War
summary: Empire II is a turn based war game and official sequel to Walter Bright's seminal 1977 strategy game Empire.

name: Emlyn Hughes International Soccer
summary:
EHIS gameplay included the basic running, kicking, shooting style but also had advanced technique gameplay which added depth and realism to the game. For example; turning naturally involved changing direction of the joystick, but instead of coming to a halt straight away, the player would slow down, stop and start to run in the direction of the joystick.

EHIS advanced techniques included The '5-direction' option. This meant that you could pass and shoot up to 5 different directions from where your player is facing. This was achieved by holding the fire button and pushing the joystick at an angle from where your player is running and releasing the button. Other techniques include sidestepping, barging, heading, back heels, lobs, diving headers, sliding tackles and many other miscellaneous features.

name: Empire's Order
summary:
Empire's Order is a unique sci-fi game that takes players on a journey on a distant planet in the galaxy where a precious ore is waiting to be mined. As the chosen one, it is up to you to settle on the planet, extract the ore, and deliver it to the Empire in a timely manner.
Players will have the ability to build their own deck, research new technologies, upgrade their equipment, trade with other players, and run operations with their agents. With a variety of gameplay options and the use of all means necessary to deliver the ore, Empire's Order offers an engaging and challenging rogue-lite incremental deck-building experience.
The game features 42 different cards, 37 different buildings, 33 events, and 84 achievements, as well as a variety of events, perks, and specializations to keep players engaged and challenged.

name: Empire Origin: Rise
summary: The grand strategy game "Empire Origin: Rise" is coming. Explore the traces left by human civilization on the earth, pursue the great achievements of the kings in the historical fragments, and revive the brilliant civilization in history. glory? territory? Waiting for you to dominate the world!

name: Empire: Total War - Elite Units of the West
summary:
Expand your Empire with downloadable content! The Elite Units of the West Downloadable Content for Empire: Total War introduces 14 completely unique brand new units from all the major Western factions. Featuring all new infantry and cavalry units, equipped with the best weapons and having undergone the most rigorous of training, the Elite Units of the West DLC is the perfect addition to your Empire's army and will bring even more options on the battlefield to all tacticians seeking to defeat their enemies.

Once you've purchased the content, you will unlock all new 14 Elite Units of the West in the single player campaign under the conditions below. They will also be available in multiplayer and single player battle modes, when playing with the appropriate faction.

name: Empress of The Deep 2: Song of The Blue Whale
summary: Anna must find a way up to the floating Temple of the Clouds and with the help of her mystic animal guides find and save the children of light from the evil Empress Pandora.

name: Empires of Creation
summary: Take on the role of fleet commander and lead your empire to victory. Conquer enemies in high octane battles to upgrade your ships and gain credits for use on the galactic market. Exploit your relations with friends and foes to establish a monopoly over your corner of the universe.

name: Embers of Magic
summary: Embers of Magic is a short, adventure visual novel that tells the story of Liana the witch. She takes an airship down to the surface of the dangerous and corrupt earth beneath her flying city home.

name: Emergency Fire Helicopter Simulator 3D
summary:
Get an unusual flight experience with Emergency Fire Helicopter Simulator 3D! Be a pilot of a firefighter helicopter – seek for fires and shut it down with tons of water! Fly over the towns, fields, and woods and be the best emergency pilot ever!

Take a sit in the cockpit of the firefight helicopter and complete all the missions! Follow the hint arrow to fly to the next mark, avoid crashes and try to fulfill as many tasks as you can to earn more points!

name: Emma at the Farm
summary: Participate in minigames involving animals and nature in this adventure game aimed at a younger audience.

name: Emerald Ambush
summary: Emerald Ambush is a single, small map for Doom II. It has been tested in PrBoom+, GZDoom, and Doom Retro. Set in an overgrown facility, this map was made mainly to get me back in the habit of mapping after a fairly lengthy break. It is similar in style to my Sucker Punch mapsets, but the green detailing is not intended to imply an easy difficulty (it shouldn't be too rough, though).

name: Emergency Robot Simulator
summary: Explore the territory contaminated by radiation. Your task is to measure the background radiation, neutralize the main radiation hotspots and recover the GPS signal. Also there is a dark secret… To figure it out you need to demine the area and destroy the unidentified drones.

name: Emery Hearts
summary: Immerse yourself in this thrilling action JRPG and uncover the secrets of Emery crystals as you face challenging enemies that will demand all your skill and ingenuity to defeat them.

name: EMIT Vol. 3: Watashi ni Sayonara wo
summary: The third part in a series of adventure games developed under Koei's "English Dream" label. Yuri continues to dig deeper into where the mysterious old man and the "other her" come from.

name: Empire Invasion
summary: Empire Invasion is an engaging and fun tower defense game. The main focus in this title is to try and keep your base safe against a variety of enemies attacking it. You have 40+ levels to test your skills, each one coming with 3 difficulty levels. It helps you test your skills in a rewarding and engaging manner, and you will find the experience to be very exciting and a lot of fun. You have 7 basic pillars, a tower upgrade system and endless replay value and strategies. You can also mix and match to see how fast you eliminate enemies. The power is in your hands, do you have what it takes to defend the kingdom? Features: 40+ levels to play through Engaging, fun tower defense gameplay 3 difficulty levels 7 basic pillar types, each can be upgraded

name: Empire: Total War - Downloadable Content Collection
summary:
Empire: Total War - Downloadable Content Pack contains the following five downloadable content packs (DLCs) for Empire: Total War:

- The Warpath Campaign (a new campaign featuring an expanded battlefield and five new, playable Indian factions)
- Elite Units of the East (adds 12 new elite units to the Maratha and Ottoman factions)
- Elite Units of the West (adds 14 new elite units to all the major Western factions
- Elite Units of the America (adds 15 new elite units to the American, British and French factions)
- Special Forces (adds 9 new elite units to various factions)

It requires Empire: Total War base game.

In addition to the above the retail version features a Bonus Disc with trailers, concept art, screenshots and more.

name: Embers of Spiritflame
summary: Embers of Spiritflame is an Emotional Point & Click detective adventure about the exploration of an old abandoned house. Inside, You go through comic book-inspired levels and begin to uncover why is everyone missing. View events and memories of the place and piece together the story.

name: Emojly: Emoji Logic Puzzles
summary: The task is simple: Solve the emoji wordle combo in 5 tries or less. Each combo has 3, 4 or 5 emojis.

name: Empire: Total War - Gold Edition
summary:
Empire: Total War - Gold Edition contains:

- Empire: Total War (base game)
- Empire: Total War - The Warpath Campaign
- Empire: Total War - Special Forces Units & Bonus Content
- Empire: Total War - Elite Units of the East
- Empire: Total War - Elite Units of the West
- Empire: Total War - Elite Units of America

name: Empty₁: First-Person Adventure
summary: Empty₁: First-Person Adventure is a first-person action-adventure game set in the 1950s. Outstanding scientists and great minds of the Soviet Union united in the revolutionary development of a colossally new historical community.

name: Emergency Rescue: Firefighters
summary: Firefighters save the day.

name: Emerald Glazed Bundle
summary:
Join the fight and venture forth into the Forgotten Realms! For a limited time only, receive an exclusive Emerald Glazed Giant Beetle mount to ease your travels. With it, you’ll be able to travel 50% faster and aide your quest for glory. Make haste – this unique bundle is only available for a limited time!
 
The Emerald Glazed Bundle includes:
• 1 Uncommon Emerald Glazed Beetle Mount
• Neverwinter Game Download

* To retrieve your mount in-game, you must complete the tutorial, then talk to the Reward Claims Agent in Protector's Enclave.

Your journey awaits you, Hero!

name: Empire City: 1931
summary: In Empire City: 1931 which is set in 1931 you are a federal agent that has to eliminate all criminal activities in New York City. You must hunt the criminals down and shoot them one by one. To locate a criminal you just have to follow the arrow on the left or right of the screen. Killing criminals is done by moving the cross hair over them. A countdown timer will start counting down if a criminal starts shooting at you. You must kill the criminal before the timer reaches zero or you'll loose a life. New bullets can be collected by shooting at the bullet boxes that regularly appear in the game as other useful objects. The criminals sometimes take hostages for protection. Rescue these hostages for additional points.

name: Ember Strike: The Battle for Willow Lane
summary: Little Legends is a puzzle fighter for PC, Mac, iOS, and Ouya.

name: Employee Recycling Center
summary: Abandoned by your co-workers after a terrible accident in the factory, you are trapped. Interact with your environment, solve puzzles and unlock up to 500 achievements in this new adventure for PC and Virtual Reality Headsets.

name: Emitime
summary: A Grid-based deck builder RPG where music and beat are your strategies. Expand your deck as you capture the enemies you encounter along the way, and solve puzzles by switching between the two protagonists from the past and future as you explore the world.

name: Empire: Sound of the North
summary: Empire: Sound of the North, a swipe em up cards game. Swipe the cards, go on adventures, solve puzzles and mysteries, make everyone happy and create your own kingdom.

name: Empires Apart
summary: Empires Apart is a Real Time Strategy game set in medieval times. Play as one of six uniquely designed factions. Gather resources, raise an army and lead your civilization to victory in a multiplayer focused classic RTS, brought to the modern age.

name: Emilio Butragueño 2
summary: Emilio Butragueño 2 is the union of two games made by Gremlin Graphics, "Gary Lineker's Superskills" and "Gary Lineker's Hot-Shot!", and released in Spain under the license from a Spanish player.

name: Emptiness
summary: In this amazing journey from emptiness to nowhere. With every step forward, new levels of emptiness unfold, expanding the boundaries of what seemed endless. Majestic landscapes, created by pixel art, gradually transform, offering players unexplored adventures and mysterious views.

name: EmyLiveShow: S&M Story
summary: Discover the depths of your fetishes and kinks with EmyLiveShow stars Emy and Nia! Spend amazing hours in the company of beautiful v-tubers and find out their secrets!

name: Ember Storia
summary: Ember Storia is a strategic RPG by Square Enix with the character design by Yūsuke Kozaki (Fire Emblem Awakening, Fire Emblem If). The game will be out on PC and Mobile on 27/11/2024 in Japan.

name: Emoto
summary: Twitch Emotes Guessing Game.

name: EmyLiveShow: Dangers & Mysteries Tale
summary: Embark on a fantasy RPG with four hot VTubers in the new game EmyLiveShow!

name: Emulate Thrill
summary: Emulate Thrill is a mobile BL game.

name: Emoj.io
summary: Eat gems, get power-ups, and unlock emojis in this fun multiplayer maze game!

name: Emporea
summary: Emporea is an oldschool fantasy strategy game, where cooperation with other players is necessary to achieve victory. Only the best alliance can win! Multiple realms available, with new ones starting every two weeks.

name: Emil: A Hero's Journey
summary: As Nazi forces take his father, equipped only with his imagination and creativity, Emil goes on a journey to find him. Emil: A Hero's Journey is a Cinematic Puzzle-Platformer, combining intense action and creative puzzle solving. inspired by actual testimonies that took place during WW2.

name: Empire: Total War - Elite Units of America
summary:
The Elite Units of America Downloadable Content for Empire: Total War adds 15 new elite units to the American, British and French factions of Empire: Total War. In the last half of the 18th century, the political upheaval from thirteen of British Colonies in North America ultimately led to the 1776 Declaration of Independence and changed History for ever. The 15 units from the Elite Units of America Downloadable Content have all played a major part in the American Revolution. Though their background owes a lot to European military traditions , their identity is tied to the destiny of the United States, and gave these men courage and audacity like no other soldier on the battlefields.

Once you've purchased the content, you will unlock all new 15 Elite Units of the West in the single player campaign under the conditions below. They will also be available in multiplayer and single player battle modes, when playing with the appropriate faction.

name: Emmitt Smith Football
summary:
A generic football game, among the many back in the day, Emmitt Smith Football has the standard Exhibition and Season modes along with multiple camera angles. It also features a 360 degree TV-style instant replay for bone-crunching and ground-breaking plays that are performed.

The one thing that sets it apart from others is the ability to create and save (using battery back-up) 64 unique plays that can be accessed at any time during a game along with the standard pre-set plays. While it does not have NFL or NFLPA licenses, it does feature then former Dallas Cowboys running back star Emmitt Smith, who is also on the front cover of the box.

name: Embergarde
summary: Embergarde is a MMORPG that's currently being developed by Runewaker Entertainment.  The game is available for download but it still far from being completed. but it appears to be using the same engine (and assets) as their previous game, Dragon's Prophet.

name: Emberheart
summary: Emberheart is a top down ARPG Hack and Slash in the likes of Diablo, Torchlight, Grim Dawn! It’s an indie title that focusses on new and exciting gameplay systems and unique end game gameplay while also going back to the roots of iconic games like Diablo 2 for inspiration.

name: Empires & Allies
summary:
On May 5, 2015, Empires & Allies was revived and re-released as an entirely different mobile game on Apple's App Store and Google Play worldwide. The old Facebook page was repurposed for this game.

8 years later, the title was shutdown on March 31, 2023

name: Emperor Kingdom
summary: Kill your enemy on your line and go forward until the end of the lines.

name: Ememe
summary: Ememe Town, a place where AI NPCs live freely. Chatting, laughing, falling in love... Now, let's simulate the life of your favorite character with generative AI!

name: Emergency Crew: Volcano Eruption
summary: Emergency Crew - an exciting strategy of selfless heroes in the time of a disaster! Embark on a heroic rescue mission! Remember - time is valuable! Save people from disaster!

name: Emergency Heroes
summary:
Become a real-life hero – drive the coolest, high-tech rescue vehicles to SAVE your city. 
 
Emergency Heroes is the open world rescue driving game that is designed for the next generation of young rescue heroes. 
 
Race to the scene in advanced police, fire and EMT rescue vehicles that let you jump over four-lane highways, power-slide into water towers and track down criminals at high speeds. By combining simple intuitive controls with fast, exhilarating action, Emergency Heroes offers an exciting experience the whole family can enjoy, exclusively on Wii™. 
 
Drive the next generation of rescue vehicles. Pilot and command numerous high-tech rescue vehicles designed specifically for ultra high-risk, high-speed navigation. Choose between police, fire and EMT vehicles. 
Explore and protect the entire city. As an emergency hero, your mission is to protect the peaceful city of San Alto. Drive through stunning free-roaming open environments, and keep the city safe at every turn. 
Two player co-op. Challenge your friends or combine forces to form the ultimate rescue hero team to protect your city. 
Fun for the whole family. Making full use of the Wii Remote™, everyone in the family can enjoy being an emergency hero. 
Fast-action Gameplay. Take advantage of Hero Mode and play like you mean it – the faster you drive, the faster you rise and gain access to invincible powers.

name: Empire Eternal
summary: Immerse yourself in the ultimate real-time strategy war game where all of human history is at your command. Create powerful empires across all eras on a scale never seen before.

name: Emeraldia
summary: Emeraldia is a puzzle arcade game released by Namco in 1993 only in Japan.

name: Embarrassed Shina-chan: The Naked Wandering College Girl
summary: Get up in the morning and see a naked female college student lying on the shadow in front of the station closest to the university If you are discovered by the police, your life will become messy! The 3D invisible action game of betting on Shy's life began ...

name: Ember: Console Edition
summary: Ember is a homage to classic role-playing games that features a deep branching story, endless exploration across a huge open world, a robust skill system, and an intricate crafting system.

name: Emlis
summary: Play as Emlis, a slime, explore an interconnected world, and fight enemies using elemental powers. Recover stolen elemental spirits from invaders to save the corrupted forest Soleen. Uncover secrets, defeat bosses, restore spirits to bring back life.

name: Embric of Wulfhammer's Castle
summary: Embric of Wulfhammer's Castle is a free adventure RPG that focuses mostly on character interactions and relationships, with minimal combat. This game contains some adult situations and nudity.

name: Emberville
summary: Help the citizens of Emberville rebuild their town, as you rescue them from the clutches of wicked forces with the aid of a mysterious and loyal friend. Learn various crafting and combat skills as you explore the treacherous corridors of a massive, ever-changing dungeon.

name: Empty Shell: The Loop
summary: Empty Shell: The Loop will take you into The Loop, a secret facility built on a Japanese island in the middle of nowhere. Volunteers are forced to enter the eerie rooms of the complex, seemingly without an exit. But what is that massive door in one of the rooms? Is there perhaps a way to escape?

name: Empire: Total War & Napoleon: Total War - Gold Edition
summary:
This bundle contains:

- Empire: Total War (Gold Edition)
- Napoleon: Total War (Gold Edition)

name: Emoji Charades
summary: A zany party game. Use a phone to create emoji clues. Your friends try to decipher those clues as fast as they can! Over 25 different trivia categories, from strange things like movies and geography to entirely normal topics like "Things Humans Do Sometimes".

name: Emerald Lake
summary: The Emerald Lake is a children's camp located next to the lake. This camp has long been abandoned due to a series of strange events that happened a long time ago. The main character is Michael, went to this camp to find his brother.

name: Embers of Mirrim
summary: To save their world from an alien threat, two proud races must set aside their differences and come together... literally.  Embers of Mirrim is an adventure-platformer featuring a mystical creature with the ability to split into light and dark embers, each independently controlled by the analog sticks.

name: Emergency 5
summary: Emergency 5 is a realtime-strategy game where players are in control of the city's emergency services and have to complete various tasks which involve the likes of police, fire department, medical services and technicians

name: Emblems: Sunless Vow
summary: Can they stop arguing long enough to escape the void?! A Roguelike Visual Novel with QUICK turn-based combat and flexible difficulty. Calculate, power-up, and stack favors to The Heart's content... Or take on a narrative campaign filled with Mystery + Drama + Shenanigans.

name: Emergency Exit
summary: Communicate. Cooperate. Escape. aEmergency Exit is an online cooperative escape/puzzle game with asymmetric gameplay. Separated and unable to see each other’s actions, players must cooperate to reach the exit before time runs out, solving puzzles and uncovering hidden secrets.

name: Empire of Angels IV
summary: Sequel of Empire of Angels III, released on Windows, steam iOS, and Android devices. The game is all in 3D and full voiced.

name: Empire Earth: The Art of Conquest
summary: Art of Conquest added several new features to the original Empire Earth, including new units, new civilizations (Japan and Korea), civilization powers, and new hero units. Art of Conquest also features three new campaigns: Ancient Rome, World War II, and 24th Century Mars.

name: Empires: Dawn of the Modern World
summary:
Empires: Dawn of the Modern World is a 2003 history-based real-time strategy computer game developed by Stainless Steel Studios and released on October 21, 2003. Considered an unofficial sequel to Empire Earth, the game requires players to collect resources to build an empire, train military units, and conquer opposing civilizations.
Based on a slightly compressed version of world history, Empires covers five eras, from the Medieval Age to World War II. The game features nine civilizations: England, the Franks, Korea, and China are playable from the Medieval Age to the Imperial Age; the United States, Russia, Germany, France, and the United Kingdom are playable in the World War I and World War II ages.
The game attracted positive critical reaction.
In 2009, Activision terminated its multiplayer server contract with GameSpy. Multiplayer can be played unofficially in Gameranger services.
